domain.description: An entertainment personality in the world, like Anderson Cooper or Miranda Sings

text: Just apropos of nothing, Iran's egregious mishandling of the virus led to 10% of its parliament infected. A good standard for a government that is Failing At Coronavirus Policy is senior politicians getting the virus.
